item.title: [Python] Tips for making an interactive bot with LINE
item.description: Hello, this is Ninomiya of LIFULL CO., LTD. I was involved in the prototype implementation of LINE bot this year. In the development of LINE SDK is prepared in languages such as Python, you can easily start making a simple bot. However, if you try to create a complicated application to a certain extent, I think that the implementation will struggle a bit, such as managing scenarios and generating FlexMessage json.
